title: "Score Infant Behavior Questionnaire - Revised"
output: html_document

```{r}
#Libraries
library(tidyverse)

#Parameters
ibq_cs_file <- "~/Desktop/BABIES/asl_infant_affect/data/ibq_cs_20180912.csv" #cross-sectional data

ibq_lg_file <- "~/Desktop/BABIES//asl_infant_affect/data/ibq_long_20180912.csv" #longitudinal data
```


###Join data from cross-sectional and longitudinal projects
```{r}
ibq <-
  read_csv(ibq_cs_file) %>% 
  rename(ID = record_id) %>% 
  mutate(ID = as.integer(ID)) %>% 
  bind_rows(
    read_csv(ibq_lg_file) %>% 
      rename(ID = record_id) %>% 
      mutate(ID = as.integer(ID))
  ) %>% 
  select(-redcap_event_name:-ibq_timestamp)
```

###Score the IBQ-R
```{r}
ibq <- 
  ibq %>% 
  mutate_at(
    vars(
      ibq_3,
      ibq_33,
      ibq_37,
      ibq_50,
      ibq_60,
      ibq_61,
      ibq_72,
      ibq_73,
      ibq_82,
      ibq_84,
      ibq_86,
      ibq_91
    ),
    funs(8 - .) #reverse code these items
  ) %>% 
  group_by(ID) %>% 
  mutate(
    act = mean( #activity level 
      c(ibq_33, ibq_34, ibq_35, ibq_39, ibq_54, ibq_55, ibq_70), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    dist = mean( #distress to limitations
      c(ibq_2, ibq_3, ibq_4, ibq_21, ibq_52, ibq_53, ibq_62), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    fear = mean( #fear
      c(ibq_22, ibq_76, ibq_77, ibq_78, ibq_87, ibq_89), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    dura = mean( #duration of orienting
      c(ibq_5, ibq_6, ibq_7, ibq_8, ibq_10, ibq_25), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    smil = mean( #smiling and laughter
      c(ibq_9, ibq_11, ibq_12, ibq_40, ibq_42, ibq_43, ibq_65), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    hip = mean( #high pleasure
      c(ibq_16, ibq_44, ibq_45, ibq_46, ibq_47, ibq_48, ibq_49), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    lip = mean( #low pleasure
      c(ibq_13, ibq_14, ibq_15, ibq_17, ibq_18, ibq_19, ibq_67), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    soot = mean( #soothability
      c(ibq_81, ibq_82, ibq_83, ibq_84, ibq_85, ibq_86, ibq_91), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    fall = 8 - mean( #falling reactivity/rate of recovery from distress
      c(ibq_36, ibq_37, ibq_38, ibq_63, ibq_71, ibq_72), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    cudd = mean( #cuddliness
      c(ibq_61, ibq_50, ibq_51, ibq_59, ibq_60, ibq_73), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    perc = mean( #perceptual sensitivity
      c(ibq_20, ibq_27, ibq_28, ibq_29, ibq_30, ibq_31), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    sad = mean( #sadness
      c(ibq_64, ibq_74, ibq_75, ibq_32, ibq_79, ibq_80), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    app = mean( #approach
      c(ibq_23, ibq_24, ibq_68, ibq_69, ibq_88, ibq_90), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    voc = mean( #vocal reactivity
      c(ibq_1, ibq_26, ibq_41, ibq_56, ibq_57, ibq_58, ibq_66), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    SUR = mean( #composite scale: surgency 
      c(app, voc, hip, smil, act, perc), 
      na.rm = TRUE
    ),
    NEG = mean( #composite scale: negative affectivity 
      c(sad, dist, fear, fall),
      na.rm = TRUE 
    ),
    REG = mean( #composite scale: regulation
      c(lip, cudd, dura, soot),
      na.rm = TRUE 
    )
  )
```

```{r}
write_csv(ibq, "~/Desktop/BABIES/asl_infant_affect/data/ibq_scored_20180912.csv")
```


```{r}
ibq %>% 
  filter(!is.na(NEG)) %>% 
  n_distinct()
```



###Visualize

```{r}
ibq %>% 
  ggplot(aes(SUR)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30) 

ibq %>% 
  ggplot(aes(NEG)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30) 

ibq %>% 
  ggplot(aes(REG)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30) 
```

```{r}
ibq %>% 
  ggplot(aes(SUR, NEG)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

ibq %>% 
  ggplot(aes(SUR, REG)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

ibq %>% 
  ggplot(aes(NEG, REG)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
